Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Clavibacterium michiganensis (IC50=7.3 µg/ml), Curtobacterium ï¬‚accumfaciens (IC50=8.9 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Agrobacterium radiobacter (IC50=8.3 µg/ml), Agrobacterium rhizogenes (IC50=8.5 µg/ml), Erwinia carobora (IC50=8.0 µg/ml).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=6.0 µg/ml), Geotrichum candidum (IC50=7.4 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Cy-AMP1 has antimicrobial activity against various plant-pathogenic fungi and bacteria.

Literature.Title: Purification, characterization, and sequencing of antimicrobial peptides, Cy-AMP1, Cy-AMP2, and Cy-AMP3, from the Cycad (Cycas revoluta) seeds.
Literature.Author: Yokoyama S, Kato K, Koba A, Minami Y, Watanabe K, Yagi F.
